name: Freeze (therevillsgames)
description:
Freeze - a late entry for the LOWREZJAM of 2021

You have committed the greatest heist of the century and now you must escape!

If a cop says FREEZE! Put your hands up with "E" and you maybe able to trick them... but watch out too many times and they will open fire!

Controls:

W - JUMP

D - RIGHT

A - LEFT

E - Hands Up

I didn't finish it in time and the game only has one level which doesn't complete - jump off the building at the end to win ;)
